DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : Add dry needle physiotherapy intervention , increase efficacy treatment plantar fasciosis . Objectives : General : Test efficacy DN addition physiotherapy treatment include : manual therapy home exercise ; direct normalize muscle tone inhibit MTP gastrocnemius soleus muscle , group patient diagnose PF . The variable measure efficacy : Pain assessment affect heel , visual analog scale ( VAS ) . Ultrasonographic assessment thickness plantar fascia affect , longitudinal view , compare contralateral . Goniometric assessment joint range ankle dorsiflexion , compare contralateral . Specific : Analyze efficacy combination DN treatment manual therapy home exercise , patient diagnose PF monitor comparison group . Methodology : Type study : clinical trial .
